message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Disagree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as if I were a primary or secondary school teacher from Flemish Community (Belgium). I need to provide responses to each of the 10 statements using one of the following options: "Strongly disagree", "Disagree", "Agree", "Strongly agree", or "I don't know".

Let me think through each statement from the perspective of a teacher:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally true. AI can assist with generating ideas, structuring content, etc. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is a positive potential of AI. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - This is a positive use case. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs - This has good potential. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - This is definitely true and a positive aspect. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a concern/risk. This is a negative statement about AI. I would "Agree" (acknowledging this is indeed a risk).

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - This is a valid concern. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a known concern. I would "Agree" with this.

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - This is a concern. I would "Agree" with this concern.

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches - This is possible. I would "Agree" or "Disagree"... I think there's a reasonable concern here, so I would "Agree".


Now I need to structure these responses as JSON for the function call.
